title: Parameters for Polar Voxel Outlier Filter Node

azimuth_resolution_rad.description: The resolution in azimuth direction [rad]. The supplied value is modified to ensure consistent voxel sizes across the whole azimuth range.

elevation_resolution_rad.description: The resolution in elevation direction [rad]. The supplied value is modified to ensure consistent voxel sizes across the whole elevation range.

voxel_points_threshold.description: The minimum number of points required per voxel.

intensity_threshold.description: The maximum intensity threshold for secondary returns (primary returns are not affected).

visibility_estimation_max_range_m.description: The maximum range to consider for visibility estimation [m] (limits visibility calculations to reliable sensor range).

visibility_estimation_min_azimuth_rad.description: The minimum range to consider for visibility estimation [rad] (limits visibility calculations to reliable sensor range).

visibility_estimation_max_azimuth_rad.description: The maximum range to consider for visibility estimation [rad] (limits visibility calculations to reliable sensor range).

visibility_estimation_min_elevation_rad.description: The minimum range to consider for visibility estimation [rad] (limits visibility calculations to reliable sensor range).

visibility_estimation_max_elevation_rad.description: The maximum range to consider for visibility estimation [rad] (limits visibility calculations to reliable sensor range).

use_return_type_classification.description: Whether to use return type classification (if false, all returns are processed).

filter_secondary_returns.description: Whether to filter secondary returns (if true, only primary returns are kept).

secondary_noise_threshold.description: Threshold for classifying primary vs secondary returns.

visibility_estimation_max_secondary_voxe.description: Maximum secondary voxel count for visibility estimation calculations.

primary_return_types.description: List of return type values considered as primary returns (all others are secondary).

visibility_estimation_only.description: Whether to run filter for visibility estimation only without publishing point cloud outputs (for monitoring/diagnostic purposes only).

publish_noise_cloud.description: Whether to generate and publish noise point cloud for debugging (ignored when visibility_estimation_only=true).

filter_ratio_error_threshold.description: The filter ratio threshold for error diagnostics (ratio of output/input points).

filter_ratio_warn_threshold.description: The filter ratio threshold for warning diagnostics (ratio of output/input points).

visibility_error_threshold.description: The visibility threshold for error diagnostics.

visibility_warn_threshold.description: The visibility threshold for warning diagnostics.

publish_area_marker.description: Publish a marker to visualize region used for visibility estimation

num_frames_hysteresis_transition.description: The number of frames to be required to transition judgement

immediate_report_error.description: Whether to report error state immediately if a single frame categorized as error

immediate_relax_state.description: Whether to relax state if observed state is better than the current one
